title: sollinilE varum sukhamE sukham
sahitya:
sollinilE varum sukhamE sukham nammai nal vazhi paDuttum gurunAthA enra


anupallavi

  nalladu tIdenru jnAna oLi kATTum kaLLam kapaTam nammil uLLAmal kAkkum


caraNam    pAsha bandhangaLai pOkkum yama pAsham varAmalE kAkkum nalla 
nEsham tanil nammai Ukkum nikunja rAsattil oruvaLAi nammaiyE shErkkum
